meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of minutes for the corrected June 24, 2024 and August 26, 2024 Housing and Homeless Solutions Committee.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Needs Assessment
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the Dallas Housing Needs Assessment.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions- Bridge Housing Pilot Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Bridge Housing Pilot by the Office of Homeless Solutions.

agenda_items.title: Real Estate
agenda_items.description: Deliberate the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property located at 2929 S. Hampton Road.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions and Housing and Community Development Properties Update
agenda_items.description: Update for projects located at various addresses.

agenda_items.title: Title Clearing and Clouded Title Prevention Pilot Program Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Title Clearing and Clouded Title Prevention Pilot Program.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Council Resolution 19-1495
agenda_items.description: Authorization for payment for legal services provided to DHADC.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Council Resolution 19-1497
agenda_items.description: Reallocation of unobligated Bond Funds for land acquisition and fees.

agenda_items.title: Inclusive Housing Task Force Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Inclusive Housing Task Force.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire Oakhouse Apartment Homes
agenda_items.description: Authorization for the acquisition and development of Oakhouse Apartment Homes.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions- Give Responsibly Campaign
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the Give Responsibly Campaign.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions- Upcoming City Council Agenda Items
agenda_items.description: Discussion on upcoming agenda items for the City Council.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the City Manager to exercise renewal options
agenda_items.description: Authorization for the City Manager to renew the facility management services contract.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the first of two renewal options to the service contract
agenda_items.description: Authorization for the service contract with Austin Street Center.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a one-year service contract for housing rental subsidies
agenda_items.description: Authorization for a service contract for housing rental subsidies for seniors.

agenda_items.title: Authorize an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County
agenda_items.description: Authorization to accept funds for homeless assistance services.

financial_items.description: Funding for facility management services contract with Bridge Steps.
Funding for service contract with Austin Street Center.
Funding for housing rental subsidies for seniors.
Funds for homeless assistance services at The Bridge.
